statements: DELETE FROM cross_docking_facility_layouts WHERE warehouse_name = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM cross_docking_facility_layouts WHERE facility_id = 101 AND warehouse_name = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM cross_docking_facility_layouts WHERE layout_description LIKE '%special%' AND storage_capacity < 500;
DELETE FROM storage_space WHERE space_id = 100 AND capacity < 5000.00;
DELETE FROM storage_areas WHERE facility_id = 103 AND area_capacity < 50;
DELETE FROM storage_spaces WHERE space_type = 'Pallet' AND capacity > 50;
